messages.content: The Tories and Lib Dems would cut Child Tax Credits and the Child Trust Fund for families on modest and middle incomes.

Labour will always help families get on, not just get by. With Labour there will be more paid leave for new dads, a new 'Toddler Tax Credit', protection for Sure Start Children’s Centres and 15 hours a week of flexible, free nursery education for three and four year olds.

messages.title: Your choice
messages.content: Our economy is recovering. Now is not the time for a novice. Now is the time for help for families. Now is the time to protect jobs. Now is the time for experience. Now is the time to vote Labour. Britain is on the road to recovery. Don't let the Tories wreck it.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introducing a 'Toddler Tax Credit' and protection for Sure Start Children’s Centres along with more leave for new dads.
15 hours a week of flexible, free nursery education for three and four year olds.

issues.economy: Our economy is recovering. Now is not the time for a novice.
issues.education: 15 hours a week of flexible, free nursery education for three and four year olds.
issues.socialWelfare: Introducing a 'Toddler Tax Credit' and protection for Sure Start Children’s Centres.

endorsements.endorsement: "Over the last 13 years a lot has changed for the good. There is more support for families and pensioners. There are more police on our streets. Britain has got better."
